.. _olmsted:

Olmsted *et al.*
================

.. code-block:: bibtex

    @article{olmsted2009survey,
        title={Survey of computed grain boundary properties in face-centered cubic metals: I. Grain boundary energy},
        author={Olmsted, David L and Foiles, Stephen M and Holm, Elizabeth A},
        journal={Acta Materialia},
        volume={57},
        number={13},
        pages={3694--3703},
        year={2009},
        publisher={Elsevier}
    }
